segments.text: I notice the water damage happening to the cabinets, it's not good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is seeping into the wood, it's going to cause lasting damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the puddle on the floor, it's spreading and reflecting the light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust seeing the water waste like this, it's not right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor might get slippery, someone could fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running down the front of the cabinets, it's not a pretty sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes near the sink, they could fall and break.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, it's a bit overwhelming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted seeing the water damage, it's such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR
